resources.string: Prince Harry is taller than Prince William ?
The five rings on the Olympic flag are interlocking?
Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest mountain in the world?
Strictly Come Dancing first aired in the UK in 2005?
A group of swans is known as a bevy?
Sydney is the capital of Australia?
The Penny Black is an old-fashioned coin?
Glastonbury had been due to celebrate its 50th anniversary in June before the festival was cancelled? T
The star sign Capricorn is represented by a goat? T
The Penny Black is the name of a valuable old coin? F
